Info.Name: Block - Form
Info.Description: Fields : Header Text, Body Text, Select Form and Button Text

GenericProperty.Name: Grid
GenericProperty.Description:
* Required 8 items. Content can be selected from:
1. Sidebars: * Call To Action * Next Online Field * Quite With Icon * Social Networks * Social Quote * Quote
2. News
3. Resources: * Recipe * Event * Download * Lesson Plan * Connected Classroom

GenericProperty.Name: Images
GenericProperty.Description: Please select the images to display in the block. Note they must be selected in the correct order, as follows: - Left hand, black & white - Small inset image - Large colour image - Right hand, black & white

GenericProperty.Name: Video URL
GenericProperty.Description: Please paste the full URL to the video.

Info.Name: Block - Image
Info.Description: Fields : Image, Header Text and Body Text

GenericProperty.Name: Image *
GenericProperty.Description: Mandatory field

GenericProperty.Name: ReadMe
GenericProperty.Description:
Images will be showed following this order:
1st image [big] --> top right 2nd image [small] --> top left 3rd image [big] --> middle left 4th image [small] --> middle right
Last two images: 5th image [small] --> bottom left 6th image [small] --> bottom right

GenericProperty.Name: ContentPageLink1
GenericProperty.Description: Allowed to link news and recipe pages

GenericProperty.Name: ContentPageLink2
GenericProperty.Description: Allowed to link news and recipe pages

GenericProperty.Name: ContentPageLink3
GenericProperty.Description: Allowed to link news and recipe pages

GenericProperty.Name: ContentPageLink4
GenericProperty.Description: Allowed to link news and recipe pages

GenericProperty.Name: YouTube Video
GenericProperty.Description: ID of video which is 11 characters.

GenericProperty.Name: Duration
GenericProperty.Description: format has to be hh:mm

GenericProperty.Name: Facebook Title
GenericProperty.Description: If empty, meta title will be used.

GenericProperty.Name: Facebook Summary
GenericProperty.Description: If empty, meta description will be used.

GenericProperty.Name: Twitter Summary
GenericProperty.Description: If empty, meta description will be used.

GenericProperty.Name: Summary Text
GenericProperty.Description: Summary Text is used on landing page if this page is placed below a landing page.

GenericProperty.Name: Summary Link Text
GenericProperty.Description: Summary link text is used on landing page if this page is placed below a landing page.

GenericProperty.Name: Footer Picks Title
GenericProperty.Description: Leave empty for "We think you might like..." text.

GenericProperty.Name: Footer Picks
GenericProperty.Description: Maximum of four item

GenericProperty.Name: Event Duration
GenericProperty.Description: format has to be hh:mm

GenericProperty.Name: Related Content
GenericProperty.Description: Please select up to 4 items to display as related content for this page. If less than for are selected the balance will be made up to 4 using tag matching.

GenericProperty.Name: Description
GenericProperty.Description: Displayed on resource hub landing page.

GenericProperty.Name: Description
GenericProperty.Description: Displayed on resource hub landing page.

GenericProperty.Name: Created By
GenericProperty.Description: Select the expert involved with creating this content.

GenericProperty.Name: Related Content
GenericProperty.Description: Please select up to 4 items to display as related content for this page. If less than for are selected the balance will be made up to 4 using tag matching.

GenericProperty.Name: Description
GenericProperty.Description: Displayed on resource hub landing page.

GenericProperty.Name: End Time
GenericProperty.Description: Enter in 24h format HH:mm

GenericProperty.Name: Additional Start Date Time
GenericProperty.Description: Add additional dates for multiple courses. This field is used only for the page to be positioned correctly on the grid on landing page and the date is not shown on the page.

GenericProperty.Name: Description
GenericProperty.Description: Displayed on resource hub landing page.

GenericProperty.Name: Created By
GenericProperty.Description: Select the expert involved with creating this content.

GenericProperty.Name: Related Content
GenericProperty.Description: Please select up to 4 items to display as related content for this page. If less than for are selected the balance will be made up to 4 using tag matching.

Wide Image

GenericProperty.Name: Tags

GenericProperty.Name: Video Url
GenericProperty.Description: full Youtube URL

GenericProperty.Name: Youtube Video Id
GenericProperty.Description: ID of video which is 11 characters.

GenericProperty.Name: Description
GenericProperty.Description: Displayed on resource hub landing page.

GenericProperty.Name: Full Kit PDF
GenericProperty.Description: zip file of all assets including teaching materials.

GenericProperty.Name: Serving Details
GenericProperty.Description: information such as : Makes, Cal, Fat Sugar, Salt. Maximum 5 elements
